content.data: {"root":{"children":[{"children":[{"detail":0,"format":0,"mode":"normal","style":"","text":"Savor the Laketown Charm","type":"text","version":1}],"direction":null,"format":"","indent":0,"type":"heading","version":1,"tag":"h2"},{"children":[{"detail":0,"format":0,"mode":"normal","style":"","text":"Bhopal attracts travelers with the scenic allure of the two majestic lakes, situated by the city. But these mesmerizing natural landscapes are not the only features or Bhopal's claim to fame. The city is also renowned for its historical significance. It is home to many prominent monuments that tell tales of the city's legendary past. Today, the capital city of Madhya Pradesh, it was once the stronghold of the Nawabs. With its beautiful natural landscape and rich cultural heritage, Bhopal is an ideal destination for a memorable family vacation.","type":"text","version":1}],"direction":null,"format":"","indent":0,"type":"paragraph","version":1},{"children":[{"detail":0,"format":0,"mode":"normal","style":"","text":"When it comes to accommodation, Bhopal boasts of a wide variety of options, suited to the needs and preferences of the different kinds of travelers that visit the city. Honoring the royal tradition of the Nawabs, the city is home to a number of heritage luxury hotels. Book a stay for your family at one of these hotels to enjoy a truly lavish experience. You can unwind with your family, while enjoying world-class facilities, such as swimming pools, hot tubs, massages, spas, fitness centers, and so on.","type":"text","version":1}],"direction":null,"format":"","indent":0,"type":"paragraph","version":1},{"children":[{"detail":0,"format":0,"mode":"normal","style":"","text":"However, if you are traveling to Bhopal on a tight budget, you can find various cost-effective accommodation options, too. These include the mid- range and economical hotels in the city that offer a comfortable stay for your family with reasonable rates. You can also try lodging at one of the bed-and-breakfast inns or homestays in Bhopal.","type":"text","version":1}],"direction":null,"format":"","indent":0,"type":"paragraph","version":1},{"children":[{"detail":0,"format":0,"mode":"normal","style":"","text":"Some of the safe and convenient neighborhoods for accommodation in Bhopal include the Bhopal Lake VIP Road locale and the MP Nagar area.","type":"text","version":1}],"direction":null,"format":"","indent":0,"type":"paragraph","version":1},{"children":[{"detail":0,"format":0,"mode":"normal","style":"","text":"Book your hotel rooms in advance using Cleartrip's pay@hotel feature for hassle-free transactions. It allows you to make your payments at the time of check-in. So, avail of our amazing deals on hotels in Bhopal and book your hotel rooms with Cleartrip today!","type":"text","version":1}],"direction":null,"format":"","indent":0,"type":"paragraph","version":1}],"direction":null,"format":"","indent":0,"type":"root","version":1}}
